column4: is there a command to check if i got conflicting packages installed?
hm, if  apt-get -f install completes successfuly, you don't have conflicting _pacakges_
it completed succesfully, thing is I installed totem-xine and i think it brought with it alot of dependancy packages, 3d driver libs, is there a way to see dependancies of a package?
yes. apt-cache depends totem-xine
yeah i've got a conflict there, it installed 3d packages for me that messed up somewhere, for a game of mine i played
thats my only idea what it could been.. is there somehow i can reinstall now totem-gstreamer and remove all totem-xine installed?
totem-xine doesn't depend on 3d stuff, but it does depend on some sound stuff
install totem-gstreamer, that will remove-totem-xine. then run apt-cache autoremove to get rid of the rest

hm... its the only thing i can think of, yesterday my game worked fine, since yesterday i only messed with two things, w32codecs and totem-xine.. i've uninstalled the codecs already and.. want to get rid of all packages xine got me
ok thanks
no such command as autoremove? =)
doh.   apt-get autoremove . I do type that by rote myself often ;)
it removed 0, thing is i also tried reinstalling the graphic driver to fix my game problem, when i reinstalled Xgl it removed 10 packages
that is very strange, xserver-xgl removing packages. what did it remove?
i dont know :) is there a log? =)
i've rebooted since
yes, /var/log/dpkg.log
that log is such a mess, i can't see what packages it removed can i paste it for you and you look? =)
at the end of the file is that relevant stuff. Just do a search in there for xserver-xgl, you'll see the rest after it
mainly, I'm only around for a couple more minutes ;)
http://paste.stgraber.org/
ah
2008-03-27 20:39:09 remove libdirectfb-extra 0.9.25.1-6ubuntu3 0.9.25.1-6ubuntu3 stuff like that it removed
